allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add /accounting prefix to admin and intercom APIs

Updated all accounting admin controllers with @RequestMapping\("/accounting"\)
Updated AccountingAdminService with MODULE_PREFIX = "/accounting"
Updated all accounting intercom controllers with @RequestMapping\("/accounting-intercom"\)
Updated AccountingIntercomService with MODULE_PREFIX = "/accounting-intercom"

This ensures all accounting API paths are prefixed with their module name for better organization and namespace separation.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
